# SK MOHAMMAD ALI - Portfolio

## About
A highly motivated Engineering student pursuing a B.Tech in Electrical Engineering at Aliah University, expected to graduate in 2028. Full-Stack Developer and IoT enthusiast. Eager to apply theoretical knowledge and develop practical skills within the field. Seeking opportunities to contribute to innovative projects and gain hands-on experience. Committed to continuous learning and professional growth within the engineering domain.

## Projects
- Voice Control Wheel Chair: An innovative engineering project focused on accessibility, allowing users to control a wheelchair through voice commands. Tags: Engineering, Voice Control, IoT.
